Comments_List: This class covers some interesting topics in host-microbe interaction. The main idea of this class is to encourage students to discuss such promising topics, which is interesting and very helpful. From this class, I know more background of host-microbe interaction and think more about this area. In addition, this class is also a good opportunity to develop ability to write grant.
A overview of various aspects of host-microbe interaction.
Strengths: good and required reading papers are marked which can help us to know better about the topics in short time
Strengths: The topics are wide ranging and very interesting. The class format facilitated discussion and encouraged questions and thinking. The workload is acceptable.

I think it may be more useful to assign less reading and instead provide 2-3 primary papers and a single review on a topic because then students would have more availability to search the literature themselves for what aspects of the topic interests them. I think that the students had a hard time balancing the assigned readings and searching deeper into the literature beyond the assigned papers.
Yes. A good class to know more about host-microbe interaction.
Yes. If they are interested in surveying the current literature and knowledge of host-microbe interactions, the class would be great for them.
